summary: This mod adds immersive save messages to Requiem and Vanilla Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=4]Forward:[/size]
[/u]
I never liked how you couldn't tell when you saved in Requiem so I made this simple mod that changes the save messages you see when you quicksave, quickload, or autosave.

[u][size=4]Overview of changes:
[/size][/u]
• "Autosaving..." changed to "Recording my surroundings..."
• "Quicksaving..." changed to "Taking note of my surroundings..."
• "Quickloading..." changed to "Reviewing my journal..."

[size=4][u]Installation:
[/u][/size]
Install with your favorite mod manager and install or if you're manually installing, extract to your data folder.

[size=4][u]Uninstallation:
[/u][/size]
Uninstall with the mod manager of your choice or remove from your data files

[size=4][u]Load order:
[/u][/size]
It doesn't matter where you put this as long as it loads after anything that makes similar changes (ex. Requiem).

[size=4][u]Compatibility:
[/u][/size]
This is compatible with anything that doesn't change the same thing
author: Snakedog
